content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_adlswaltercalcagno_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_adlswaltercalcagno_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@adlswaltercalcagno.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[humedad] (
	[time] datetime2(7),
	[latitud] float,
	[longitud] float,
	[HR_Valor] float,
	[CodigoNacional] nvarchar(4000),
	[nombreEstacion] nvarchar(4000),
	[anno] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'humedad/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_adlswaltercalcagno_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[humedad]
GO
